Replace.Text: The painting stars do not agree with this.
The painting stars unanimously recognize you as our friends, come and listen to our chorus.
Is the time not yet ripe? I will ask you again.
I know that a blind friendship cannot protect the future of me and the Huixing. Now, I am ready to face the anger of me and the Huixing!
We have no choice but to retreat. Now, show your weapons, and the Painting Stars will send you back to the dust.
Well, I'm careless, we'll come next time.
Without the country, I still have the painted stars. One day, I will join them and embark on a journey back to the stars again.
Come on, come on, the painting stars will treat you well.
Wait a while, right? We are preparing for the concert and have no time to host your delegation.
The painting stars are very interested in your country. We will soon organize a diplomatic mission to go to your place and bring our favorite maple leaves together. Will you receive them well?
The painting stars said, I will visit your house later.
You, you, so rude and so untrustworthy, the Huixing and I will no longer have friendly contacts with you! [NEWLINE](Condemns you)
Hi, hello, I am Akie Akie and I like singing. We are currently working hard to repair the spaceship I have returned home. Do you want to help me?
If you don’t mind, would you go to the place where the Huixing and I rest?
How is your music like? Can I listen to you again?
On behalf of the Paixing, I thank you!
It sounds black, right? Let’s take a look at our chorus in the Holy Land.
(Your [ICON_Faith] faith value output is very low)
I promised to help me repair the spacecraft, but your level is not good.
(Your [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value output is very low)
Let's just stop here. I finally persuade the Huixing people, it's better to be harmonious.
The painting stars said that this battle could not end so hastily.
Enough, the Painting Stars can no longer suffer losses, let's go back to peace.
Don't disturb the Huixing people when passing by.
No, we have to hold a concert, for safety reasons, forget it.
The painted stars need to pass through your territory, can they?
Your troops are far from those of the Paixing.
Yes, just do it like that?
You have obtained a lot of faith values, and the painted stars are happy
You have not gained much faith value, and the painters are very disappointed
You have obtained a lot of tech value, and the painters are very happy
The technology you have obtained is not much value, and the painting stars are very disappointed

The song spans endless time and space into stars, embellishing the lonely night sky, guiding the faith of autumn colors. You resonate with the galaxy with your singing, and you are implicated with the stars with your destiny. And now, your voice will guide the people on this land to the sea of ​​stars and turn into the stars you protect and protect you. Akie Akie, open the story of civilization with you and the Painted Stars, from the beginning of space to the end of time.
The thousands of years are painted as the song of stars, the moon is dizzy and the years are flowing
Sang Jing listens to the rain

"Life in Name" Military Unit [ICON_DAMAGED] Life Reply +5, each [ICON_CITIZEN] citizen provides 1 [ICON_FAITH] belief value and [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity output. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] The dissatisfaction value of "Love" for other civilizations is reduced by half; religious pressure +20%. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] The "Kaoling Youge" mountain range provides a large number of adjacent bonuses for the holy land area, and the ranged units +6 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power on the hills. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] "Autumn Rain Echo" gives points equal to 30% of the [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity consumption [ICON_GREATWRITER] great writer, [ICON_GREATARTIST] great artist, [ICON_GREATMUSICIAN] great musician points. Get [ICON_GREATMUSICIAN] Big Musician Points +10%[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] "Eternal First-Class Star" construction area +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity. In the Golden Age of [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE], [ICON_FAITH] belief value, [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value +15%; in the Dark Age of [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE], an extra +1 when you get the Age score.
The Holy Land provides a [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value equal to its adjacent bonus. +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity when city conducts space race events. All units +1 field of view.

Stargazer's special melee unit, production cost is higher, gold coins maintenance fee is replaced with faith value maintenance fee, combat effectiveness is always 5 higher than that of the general melee unit of this era [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat power, +5 within 8 blocks of our holy land area [ICON_STRENGTH ] Combat power, change its beliefs when occupying a city. Can be purchased using the [ICON_FAITH] faith value.

Stargazers' characteristic holy land building, alternative to shrines. Extra +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, the city outputs an additional +0.5 loyalty pressure per citizen. Unlock the project "Glorious Walk"
The Tower of Poetry Birds - Brilliant Walk

Only once, after completion, add 2 slots to the city's "Pagoda of Poetry" that can be placed in any masterpiece [ICON_GREATWORK_SCULPTURE], religious units trained in this city +5 [ICON_RELIGION] religious combat power. The city can build an additional area regardless of population.
+{1_num} [ICON_FAITH] The belief value comes from adjacent mountains (Kaoling Youge)
+5 combat power within 8 blocks of the holy land
+5 within 8 blocks of the Holy Land
After unlocking the original melee unit, combat effectiveness is improved
Belief bonuses are leading civilizations, and hostile to civilizations without faith
Trying to obtain the [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, like a civilization that is also focused on the [ICON_SCIENCE] technology. I don't like [ICON_SCIENCE] Civilization with low technology value.
